title: Task 36

fillInTheBlank.sentence: Hey, Sophie, I'm working on a project _ uses many _. I'm not sure how to manage them all.

blanks.feedback: This word connects the project to what it uses, serving as a bridge between project and the information that follows.
It is like a box where you can store information that can change; it is used to keep track of data that might change as the program runs.

dialogue.text: Hey, Sophie, I'm working on a project that uses many variables. I'm not sure how to manage them all.

description: That can be used as a relative pronoun to connect parts of a sentence, referring to nouns mentioned earlier. It's often used to give more information about something or to define it more clearly.
